name: CMB Information Portal
tag_list: cycle, cycling, bikes, biking, bicycle, compare, comparison, used-bicycles, used-bikes, events, technology, news, tips, fitness, hydration, nutrition, sport, racing, bmx, sports
overview:
ChooseMyBicycle.com is a comprehensive, unbiased portal for all things bicycling.

Users can compare bicycles across various brands and categories. There is also a ‘Help Me Choose’ function to help users find the right bicycle for their need and usage. Users interested in used bicycles also have the option of finding them based on location.

If a user finds a bicycle he is interested in, he can contact his local dealer using our portal.

The portal also features tips, events, news and technology sections to help users keep abreast of the happenings in the world of bicycles.
